wikipedia_page.main: Mark Francis Watts (born 11 June 1964, in London), is a former Labour Party Member of the European Parliament (MEP), and now public affairs lobbyist and public relations advisor, having represented South East England United Kingdom from 1994 to 2004.

link_mentions.page: 2004 European Parliament election in the United Kingdom

response: * Mark F. Watts, lobbyist & former Labour MEP
* Mark F. Watts, Labour MEP from 1994 to 1999 for Kent East, then South East England from 1999 to 2004
* Mark F. Watts (born 1964), British member of the European Parliament, 1994–2004
